thread.title: ‘Moonlight’ just won Best Picture after the most wild, stunning screw-up in Oscars history
thread.title_full: ‘Moonlight’ just won Best Picture after the most wild, stunning screw-up in Oscars history

author: Jack Mirkinson
title: ‘Moonlight’ just won Best Picture after the most wild, stunning screw-up in Oscars history
text:
OH MY GOD DID YOU SEE THAT?!?!?!?! 
I CANNOT DEAL WITH WHAT JUST HAPPENED. 
MOONLIGHT WON BEST PICTURE AT THE OSCARS BUT EVERYONE THOUGHT LA LA LAND, WHICH WAS HEAVILY FAVORED TO WIN, WON BECAUSE WARREN BEATTY AND FAYE DUNAWAY READ THE WRONG MOVIE OUT BECAUSE THEY WERE GIVEN THE WRONG CARD AND THE LA LA LAND PEOPLE WERE GIVING THEIR SPEECHES AND THEN A GUY HAD TO COME OUT AND INFORM EVERYONE THAT MOONLIGHT HAD ACTUALLY WON. AND WARREN BEATTY OF ALL PEOPLE HAD TO APOLOGIZE AND MOONLIGHT , A BEAUTIFUL, INCREDIBLE, UNBELIEVABLE MASTERPIECE NOBODY THOUGHT WOULD WIN, IS THE BEST PICTURE WINNER AND I AM LEGITIMATELY DEAD. O MY GOD. #Oscars shocker: Warren Beatty reads the wrong Best Picture winner, 'La La Land' didn't win — 'Moonlight' did. pic.twitter.com/iB6TLxyTn5
